TL Software 0.1 (and earlier) is licensed under the [GNU GPL v2](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/gpl-2.0.en.html). Quarto version 1.4 is licensed under the [MIT License](https://opensource.org/license/mit/). We believe that it's better for everyone if the tools used for research and science are free and open. Reproducibility, widespread sharing of knowledge and techniques, and the leveling of the playing field by eliminating cost barriers are but a few of the shared benefits of free software in science.
